archive.description: Ensure exclusivity in tool and user interactions by making only one tool call at a time, without simultaneous user responses during the call, and vice versa.
references: You should only make one tool call at a time.
If you make a tool call, you should not respond to the user simultaneously.
If you respond to the user, you should not make a tool call at the same time.
